content: materials drops silke-alpaca from garnstudio 350-400-500 g color no 6208 light gray-blue drops crochet hook size 5 mm / h/8 or the crochet hook size needed to obtain correct crochet gauge crochet gauge 3 rounds in crochet square = 6 cm / 2 3/8 after 5 rounds the crochet square measures approx 18 cm / 7 in diameter
